name: Goecha La Trek - In Search of Kangchenjunga
description: The state of Sikkim boasts of pristine beauty and a very calm and serene atmosphere. Apart from the Buddhist culture, the natural beauty of the state is the greatest attraction for tourists seeking peace and tranquillity. Sikkim also has a number of interesting and challenging trekking trails that have over the years become a favourite among experienced and amateur trekkers. In this journey, you will visit some of the most amazing places in the Himalayas and also witness some stunning sunrise and sun sets.
